Supplementary code and analysis for publication.

Analyses:

* [Global read counts](global_read_counts.html). Read counts per sample normalized
to input levels.
* [Bivalent chromatin](bivalent_chromatin.html). Histone marks on
bivalent-chromatin annotated regions.
* [Public RNA-seq analysis](rna_seq_collier_2017.html). Gene expression analysis
on RNA-seq public data.
* [Gene groups](gene_expression_groups.html). Gene expression analysis
on groups (high-med-low expressed genes) obtained from
[Public RNA-seq data](rna_seq_collier_2017.html).
